title: Daily AI chatbot use linked to 30% higher depression risk, US study finds

title: Review: No ‘Mercy’ for audiences from this schlocky sci-fi flick
description: Presented as a real-time artificial intelligence mystery, almost the entire film is a dim close-up of Chris Pratt strapped to a chair.
content: The schlocky dystopian action thriller “Mercy” touts itself as having been “filmed for IMAX,” but that’s not such a selling point when almost the entire film is a dim close-up of Chris Pratt strapped to a chair. This real-time AI mystery is a mashup ... [3883 chars]

title: Yiren Digital Recognized with "Annual Digital Intelligence Innovative Application Award" by Caijing New Media
description: BEIJING, Jan. 22, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- Yiren Digital Ltd. (NYSE: YRD) ('Yiren Digital' or the 'Company'), a leading Fintech company specializing in digital consumer lending, insurance and financial technology innovation across China and Southeast Asia, announced today that it has received the 'Annual Digital Intelligence Innovative Application Award' under the 'New Technology' category. The award was organized by Caijing New Media in conjunction with Analysys, the China Virtual Reality Technology and Innovation Platform, the Zhongguancun Shu Zhi Artificial Intelligence Industry Alliance, Qingbo(dsdata), and other key industry bodies. Other winners in other categories include Alibaba, Tencent, Honor, Tiktok, and JD.
